scripts.start: concurrently -c 'red,green,blue' -n 'paper,bibwatch,expose' -p '{name}' 'npm run watch'  'npm run watch-dl-bib' 'npm run watch-expose'
scripts.watch: node_modules/watch/cli.js 'echo "tex change detected" && npm run build' --filter=util/watch-filter.js ./src/
scripts.watch-expose: node_modules/watch/cli.js 'echo "tex change detected" && npm run latexmk-expose' --filter=util/watch-filter.js ./src/
scripts.start-old: concurrently 'npm run serve' 'npm run screenshot-watch' 'npm run build-watch'
